text: Terpeniye - eto shchit veruyushchego i yego oruzhiye. Im on preodolevayet trudnosti i bedy, s kotorymi vstrechayetsya. My ispytyvayem vas to tem, to drugim sposobom: strakhom, golodom, nedostatkom, nekotorymi poteryami imushchestva, zhizni blizkikh i plodov. Tol'ko stoykost' spasot vas ot etikh tyazholykh ispytaniy. Obraduy (o Mukhammad!) terpelivykh
